definition: see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: Under such a disadvantage, Chang An was hit by a security high voltage electric shock device.
sentences.chinese: 在这样的劣势下，常安被保安的高压电击器击中。

sentences.english: Never suppose low voltage cannot quite possibly be dfuryous.
sentences.chinese: 决不能以为高压电没危境。

sentences.english: When using high voltage electron microscopes (HVEM), a large increase in section thickness is then possible.
sentences.chinese: 运用高压电镜使得观察的切片厚度大大增加成为可能。

sentences.english: A group of guards emerge from the door and shoot Jack with a Taser dart.
sentences.chinese: 一队警卫从门内现身，用高压电击枪射中了杰克。

sentences.english: The experiment was designed to study the condition of rabbit myocardium after 10 000-Volt high tension electricity injury by using light and electron microscopes.
sentences.chinese: 应用光镜和电镜观察家兔在高压电损伤后的心肌变化。

sentences.english: A new type high accuracy high voltage D. C. power supply used for electron beam exposure sysfem is described.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍一种电子束曝光机用新型精密高压电源。

sentences.english: System uses high voltage generated by its own DC─Voltage multiplier instead of commercial high voltage supply.
sentences.chinese: 系统采用直流倍压器产生的高压代替市售高压电源。

sentences.english: The article explains a high-power high frequency and high voltage power supply which is used in X-ray Radial Diffraction instrument.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种用于X射线衍射仪的大功率高频高压电源。

sentences.english: To avoid the dangers of people or animals, High-Voltage usually adopts high-line transmission.
sentences.chinese: 为防止人畜触电，高压电一般采用高架线传送。

sentences.english: He noticed the remains of a snake which was would round the electric wires of a 16,000- volt power line.
sentences.chinese: 他看到一条死蛇缠在一根一万六千伏的高压电线上。

sentences.english: It is a new ligh voltage apparatus product for city transformation and construction.
sentences.chinese: 是适合城市改造和建设的新一代高压电器产品。

sentences.english: The first stationary contact may be connected to a phase of a high-voltage power source.
sentences.chinese: 第一静接点可以与高压电源的一个相连接。

sentences.english: It is also used as a semiconductor in high-voltage applications.
sentences.chinese: 它也被当作半导体用在高压电器中。

sentences.english: The result of the study demonstrated that organic injury occurred in myocardium after high tension electricity injury.
sentences.chinese: 实验结果证实高压电损伤后心肌可发生器质性损害。

sentences.english: High-voltage commonly take overhead line send to prevent man and animal get an electric shock.
sentences.chinese: 为防止人畜触电，高压电一般采用高架线传送。

sentences.english: The circuit schematic diagram of the high voltage pulse power supply is designed by author.
sentences.chinese: 作者设计了脉冲高压电源的电路原理图。

definition: to electrocute/to die from an electric shock
to leak electricity/(fig.) (coll.) to unintentionally arouse romantic interest (by being solicitous etc)/cf. 放電|放电[fang4 dian4]
to get an electric shock/to be electrocuted/electric shock
